name: btc-price-guessing-game-backend
description: Backend for BTC Price Guessing Game

scripts.init-db: docker run -p 5432:5432 -d -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=epilot -v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data --user postgres --name epilot-db postgres && sleep 5 && docker cp ./dump.sql epilot-db:/tmp/dump.sql && docker exec -i epilot-db psql -U postgres -d epilot -f /tmp/dump.sql
